# Changelog
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.


## [0.0.1]
### Initial version

Create inital node for creating and extracting tarballs.

**Note:** The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/), and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

name: package.json
package.json
README.md
template:
# node-red-nodes
Tar.xz node for Node-RED.  Compress/decompress tar.xz files.

Takes a Filename and checks whether it needs to be compressed or decompressed.
Performs operation in place.

TODO
* Compression levels (current default:6/9)
* Mustache templating
* Custom archive name

template:
Gzip NodeRED Node
=================

This is a node used in Node-RED, based on [pako](https://github.com/nodeca/pako)

Install
-------

`npm install node-red-contrib-gzip`
